reviewText: These are entertaining and educational stories that never cause an excess of excitement.  My son asks for them more often than his other movies because they are good quiet fun.

I can relate to this quote from Hermie!  The main theme in Hermie and the High Seas is "I can trust God, no matter what happens." The story moves along at a nice pace for young children.  The songs are entertaining, and the characters are likeable, too.  Both the kids and I really enjoyed this movie!  Plus, it has a great lesson woven into the plot!
If you have young children and want them to watch wholesome movies, than this is one for you!! Everyone will enjoy watching it!!
This Hermie and friends video is a great kids DVD. A must have for teaching kids values in a fun way with fun characters. Our kids love to share these with their friends who have never seen them!
Not only educational but very entertaining!! A great buy for the whole family . My kids watch it over n over again.
